participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: ambitious and imaginative with a hint of nostalgia for her artistic past.
participant_1.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i have two grown children who never visit.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and introspective, with a deep appreciation for tranquility.
participant_2.background: i haven't spoken in three months. i live in alaska. i'm a buddhist. i like meditation.
